info.name: wallet-service
info.description:
Wallet API service for an e-comerce application.

Features:

- Cutomer CRUD
    
- Merchant CRUD
    
- Wallet Creation
    
- View wallet details
    
- Debiting of wallet
    
- Crediting of wallet
    
- View wallet transaction history

request.description:
Returns a paginated list of all customers and their details

Query Parameters:

- page \[page number for pagination | int | optional\]

request.description:
Returns details of a customer specified by the customer_id path variable

Path Variables:

- customer_id \[id of customer to show | string | required\]

request.description:
Creates a customer

Request Fields:

- name \[customer name | string | required\]
    
- email \[customer email | string | required\]
    
- phone_no \[customer phone number| string, format: +2349099223411 | required\]
    
- address \[customer address | string | required\]
    
- city \[customer city | string | required\]
    
- state \[customer state | string | required\]
    
- country \[customer country | string | required\]
    
- postal_code \[customer postal code| int, 6 digits| required\]

response.name: customer-create
response.body:

request.description:
Updates details of the customer specified by the customer_id path variable

Path Variables:

- customer_id \[id of customer to update | string | required\]
    

Request Fields:

- name \[customer name | string | optional\]
    
- email \[customer email | string | optional\]
    
- phone_no \[customer phone number| string, format: +2349099223411 | optional\]
    
- address \[customer address | string | optional\]
    
- city \[customer city | string | optional\]
    
- state \[customer state | string | optional\]
    
- country \[customer country | string | optional\]
    
- postal_code \[customer postal code| int, 6 digits | optional\]

request.description:
Deletes the customer specified by the customer_id path variable

Path Variables:

- customer_id \[id of customer to delete | string | required\]

Creates a wallet for the customer specified by the customer_id path variable

Path Variables:

- customer_id \[id of customer for the wallet | string | required\]
    

Request Fields:

- name \[wallet name | string | required \]
    
- currency \[wallet currency | string | optional | allowed values: USD, EUR, GBP, NGN\]

Returns all the wallets for the customer specified by the customer_id path variable

Path Variables:

- customer_id \[id of customer for the wallet | string | required\]

Returns a paginated list of all merchants and their details

Query Parameters:

- page \[page number for pagination | int | optional\]

request.description:
Deletes the merchant specified by the merchant_id path variable

Path Variables:

- merchant_id \[id of merchant to delete | string | required\]

Creates a wallet for the merchant specified by the merchant_id path variable

Path Variables:

- merchant_id \[id of merchant for the wallet | string | required\]
    

Request Fields:

- name \[wallet name | string | required \]
    
- currency \[wallet currency | string | optional | allowed values: USD, EUR, GBP, NGN\]

Returns all the wallets for the merchant specified by the merchant_id path variable

Path Variables:

- merchant_id \[id of merchant for the wallet | string | required\]

Returns a paginated list of all wallets and their details

Query Parameters:

- page \[page number for pagination | int | optional\]

Returns details of a wallet specified by the wallet_id path variable

Path Variables:

- wallet_id \[id of wallet to show | int | required\]

Performs a credit transaction on the wallet specified by the wallet_id path variable

Path Variables:

- wallet_id \[id of wallet to credit | string\]
    

Request Fields:

- name \[amount to be credited | decimal | required \]
    
- narration \[transaction narration | string | optional\]

Performs a debit transaction on the wallet specified by the wallet_id path variable

Path Variables:

- wallet_id \[id of wallet to debit | string\]
    

Request Fields:

- name \[amount to be debited | decimal | required \]
    
- narration \[transaction narration | string | optional\]

Returns a paginated list of all transactions on the wallet specified by the wallet_id path variable

Query Parameters:

- page \[page number for pagination | int | optional\]
    

Path Variables:

- wallet_id \[id of the wallet | string | required\]
